filecoin_growth_impact: $20k+ worth of onchain transactions in $FIL and $USDFC
description: Lighthouse has built perpetual Storage for AI, DePin and NFTs. Trusted by thousands of apps and Preserving millions of objects on Filecoin. Lighthouse introduced perpetual storage on top of Filecoin, ensuring that the worldâ€™s most valuable data, from AI models to scientific research, remains accessible for generations
additional_impact:
The Safe Team recently highlighted Lighthouse Storage in their Web3 encryption research, noting that "The Lighthouse Storage protocol uses threshold encryption for storing files on Filecoin, only decrypting files for authorised users."

Read the full research: https://safe.global/blog/safe-research-the-state-of-encryption-in-web3
end_user:
Lighthouse offers permanent, decentralized storage powered by Filecoin. Secure, scalable, and ideal for individuals, developers, and enterprises.

Developers and startups who are looking for easy to use tooling to store on Filecoin benefit from our solution. They can easily pay in Crypto and Fiat. Lighthouse has popular SDKs in JS, Python and APIs that can onboard startups, devs to Filecoin in no-time. Users can easily login with metamask or github/google login as well. 

Highlighting some recent wins - 

1. Axelar integration, users can now pay in stablecoins - USDC/USDT on Base, Polygon and USDFC on Filecoin (FVM)

2. Python SDK v0.1.5 - Enhanced storage and retrieval. Full metadata access, balance and key management via code. IPNS support for permanent links

3. Javascript SDK v0.4.0. Cleaner CLI, encrypted text uploads, Large files support, multi-user batch uploads and Infrastructure upgrades

4. Recognition by SAFE for our threshold cryptography
